Anywhere and Anytime

title: Multipurpose
Corporate Card
features.desc: Pay various company expenses to payees by using crypto! Keep a healthy cash flow and maintain business flexibility.

title: Industry-leading
Security Features
features.desc: We use Industry-leading security features to protect your card security, like data encryption, 2FA, password protection, instant notifications and more.

title: Apply Your Card Quickly
cardGroup.desc: Open an account and apply for a card with our mobile app in just 2 working days. It’s fast and free.

title: Global Cash Withdrawals
cardGroup.desc: Withdraw cash in multiple local currencies from ATMs displaying the VISA logo globally.

title: Worldwide Acceptance
cardGroup.desc: Enjoy seamless transactions with over 40 million Visa merchants and consumer websites across the globe.

title: Efficient Payroll Processing
cardGroup.desc: Crypto institutions can now utilize Stella to seamlessly send digital currency as salaries or bonuses to your global workforce, eliminating traditional banking hurdles.

download.title: Stella Pay
download.subtitle: Your digital asset management expert
download.desc: Manage your digital asset and track all your transactions just in one APP.

FAQs.header: How do I apply for a Stella Card?
text: Sign up for a Stella Pay App account and complete our KYC verification.
Apply for your preferred card type.Support physical card and virtual card.
Deposit your cryptocurrencies and exchange the cryptocurrencies to top up the card.

FAQs.header: Is the Stella Visa Card a credit or debit card?
text: The Stella Visa Card is a prepaid card. Broadly speaking, prepaid cards are the same as debit cards. The difference is that debit cards are linked to your bank account, but prepaid cards need to be topped up. In our case, you can top up using cryptocurrency.
Stella Card is accepted anywhere Visa® debit cards are accepted, at over 40M+ merchants worldwide.
You can top up your card using your preferred Crypto in the Stella Pay App.
Information about fees and limits (i.e. free ATM withdrawals, interbank exchange rates, top-ups, etc.) can be found in the StellaPay App.
Currently, we support the conversion and spending of USDC, USDT, BTC, ETH with your Stella Card, and will support more in the future.

FAQs.header: What happens if my payment gets refunded?
text: The Stella Card is denominated in base currency, the base currency is determined when you apply for the card, and all related transactions are processed in base currency. Therefore, refunds of any kind will always be credited in base currency. Currently the base currency supported by our card is USD. In the future, our card will support base currency denomination of more types of currencies.

user.phoneNumberTipsContent1: 1. Two security verification methods are required for withdrawals and other actions. Using only one verification method will limit your withdrawals.
user.phoneNumberTipsContent2: 2. Disabling Two-Factor Authentication will put your account at greater risk for unauthorized access. If you disable 2FA, it is highly recommended that you re-enable it as quickly as possible.

earilybird.description: Until October 31st, 24:00 , if the accumulated top-up amount in the Stella virtual card exceeds 500 USDC (or equivalent) , you can receive a physical card for free!
earilybird.faqTitle: How to Claim Your Free Physical Card?
faqs: Simply top up 500 USDC or more into your Stella virtual card  before October 31st.
Starting November 1st, eligible users will find the special offer in the Stella Pay app.
Just provide your shipping address through the app and get ready to enjoy your complimentary Physical Card!
earilybird.openCardSubTitle: Open Your Stella Virtual Card Now?
earilybird.openCardContent: To participate in the Early Bird offer, you need to open your Stella Virtual Card first. Would you like to open it now ?
